title: Unable to create/join competitive team
body: I can't seem to join the beta tournament cup. Could that have anything to do with me being dishonorable? really sad that i can't join my buddies to conquer the rift :(

replies.body: Clash is still only being tested so things *might* change, but for now, Clash entry requires having Honor Rank 2 or higher.

The thing is i got chat restricted for flaming a inting guy in my plat promos, i got back to honor lv 1 like 2 months ago and i got honored like 250 times meanwhile and there is no way ... like literally NO WAY to get out of Honor lv 1 because i have read so many posts now of ppl saying they can't get out of honor lv 1 anymore. That is a thing you definitly should look after that because people do change and sometimes its not even their fault.. Now we all can't play with friends or atleast get a bit of that loot from those tournaments.
unfortunate, guess the people that love comp aka me have to stay with ESL then.
I have a made a team of 5 people and 1 of them is not gonna be able to play today and i tried to kick him but i can it says we locked in already wtf..... so i m out?

Lvl 30+
Ranked in 1 or more Queues
Honor 2+
